Package com.chatapp.android.core.chatapphelperclass

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChatappCache
    This class holds our bitmap caches (memory and disk).
    ChatappCache.RetainFragment
    A simple non-UI Fragment that stores a single Object and is retained over configuration changes.
    ChatappDialogUtils  
    ChatappFontUtils
    Created by Team TBT on 2/17/2017.
    ChatappImageLoader
    This class wraps up completing some arbitrary long running work when loading a bitmap to an ImageView.
    ChatappImageLoader.AsyncDrawable
    A custom Drawable that will be attached to the imageView while the work is in progress.
    ChatappImageUtils  
    ChatappPermissionValidator
    created by Adhash Team on 10/6/2016.
    ChatappRegularExp
    created by Adhash Team on 6/15/2017.
    ChatappSMSReceiver  
    ChatappUtilities  
    ChatappUtils
    This class contains static utility methods.
